::: boxy

#### Variance

$s^2 = \frac{\Sigma(X-\bar{X})}{N-1}$

:::

::: boxy

#### Standard Deviation

$s = \sqrt{\frac{\Sigma(X-\bar{X})}{N-1}}$

:::

::: boxy

#### z-score

${z = \frac{X - \bar{X}}{\sigma}}$

:::

::: boxy

#### Confidence limits on z

$X = \mu \pm 1.96\sigma$

:::
